programme.title: Anak Hoki
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki berjanji dengan teman wanitanya bahawa dia akan bersamanya pada hari lahirnya iaitu dua hari kemudian. Kemudian pada petang itu semasa berhenti untuk minum di sebuah bar, dia tersilap diculik kerana menyerupai anak seorang jutawan.

programme.desc: Berkisar tentang dua orang pemuda kampung berhijrah ke bandar untuk mencari kekayaan. Setelah beberapa lama berusaha mereka masih dibelegu dengan masalah kewangan. Oleh itu mereka mula terjebak dalam pelbagai kegiatan judi sebagai jalan mudah untuk cepat kaya.

programme.title: Sumpahan Puaka
programme.desc: seorang pelukis yang pergi kesebuah kampung untuk mencari ilham melukis. Disana dia menyewa sebuah bilik milik seorang wanita. Dia juga menemui seorang tua ibu kepada wanita berkenaan yang berjaya meraih simpatinya. Pelbagai peristiwa misteri anih dan menyeramkan berlaku sepanjang beliau berada dikampung berkenaan.

programme.title: Kao Krian
programme.desc: usaha seorang pemuda yang juga merupakan waris kepada sebuah bangunan hotel terbiar menghalau hantu yang telah menghuni bangunan tersebut. programme.title: Maria Mariana 1
programme.desc: Dua beradik perempuan dibesarkan dalam sebuah keluarga, namun adik memiliki sikap negatif dan berprasangka tidak baik terhadap kasih sayang yang diberikan oleh kedua ibu bapanya dan merasakan ibu bapanya memberi kasih sayag yang lebih kepada kakaknya.

programme.title: Teacher Chan Ram
programme.desc: Chan Ram dibesarkan di sebuah kampung di mana ibu bapa sudah biasa menghantar anak perempuan mereka bekerja di Bangkok. Dia hanya tamat darjah 4 sahaja kerana tidak mampu untuk menyambung pelajaran. Bagaimanapun, dia membuka sekolah kecil untuk mengajar orang-orang bukit dengan sokongan ibu bapanya dan Siwapong rakan sekolahnya yang pulang ke kampung dan membantunya.

programme.title: Mache Fusion
programme.desc: Sejak kecil Mahmud memang meminati bidang masakan dan bercita-cita untuk menjadi seorang Chef yang berjaya suatu hari nanti. Minatnya timbul apabila sering membantu ibunya di dapur dan dia juga membesar dengan masakan-masakan tradisional negeri kelahirannya.

programme.title: High School Life
programme.desc: Mengisahkan sekumpulan pelajar lelaki sangat meminati muzik sehingga mereka sanggup ponteng sekolah dengan memberikan pelbagai alasan untuk mencapai matlamat mereka.

programme.title: Seleksi Sinema Ep5
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Just The Way You Are
programme.desc: Drake terlibat dalam permainan pertaruhan dengan kawan baiknya, iaitu cuba mendapatkan hati Sophia. dan sekiranya sophia sudah jtuh cinta dengan drake, dia harus menceritakan segala-galanya kepada sophia yang semua nya itu Cuma dusta dan taruhan.

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Seri dan Nasir adalah wartawan dan jurugambar yang gigih mencari scoop dalam liputan berita mereka. Selepas membuat scoop sindiket rokok di pulau pinang Nasir pulang ke Kuala Lumpur. Nasir terkejut apabila melihat isterinya sedang berasmara dengan lelaki lain di biliknya.

programme.title: Hati Mulia Guru Honorer Pada Murid-Muridnya Yang Membuahkan Kesuksesan
programme.desc: Yoga bekerja sebagai Guru Honerer, dan dia bersemangat untuk mengajar supaya pelajar boleh mendapat gred yang baik. Yoga sentiasa memikirkan tentang pelajar kerana dia mahu mereka berjaya pada masa hadapan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep388
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Bintang Pantura 6 Ep35
programme.desc: Bintang Pantura 6 kini kembali! Juragan Soimah ditemani oleh Nunung (Pembantu Juragan) dan Inul Daratista (Rakan Perniagaan Juragan) akan mencari 40 peserta untuk bertanding di pentas impian. Bersama mentor: Nassar, Via Vallen, Dewi Perssik, Jenita Janet, Happy Asmara dan para Konco Pantura.

programme.title: Cinta Suci Ep306
programme.desc: Suci yang terjerat dalam masalah harus bernikah dengan Marcel kerana dia sangat memerlukan wang untuk menguruskan suami dan anaknya, iaitu Aditya dan Ronny agar mereka berdua dapat meneruskan hidup. Manakala, Monica membenci Suci kerana dia menganggap bahawa Suci telah memaksa Marcel mengahwininya.

programme.title: Jangan Panggil Gue Pak Haji Ep22
programme.desc: Babe Markum adalah pemilik restoran yang rendah hati dan hidangannya terkenal di kawasan sekitar. Semua jiran dan pelanggan selalu memanggilnya "Pak Haji" walaupun dia tidak pernah mengunjungi ke tanah suci. Impiannya adalah untuk pergi ke kota-kota Islam yang suci dan merealisasikan nama panggilannya suatu hari nanti.

programme.title: Jatuh Bangun Perjuangan Anak Supir Yang Sukses Menjadi Polwan
programme.desc: Cita-cita Aisyah ingin menjadi polis wanita, tetapi kewangan keluarganya hanya sederhana. Namun begitu, ibu bapa Aisyah bertekad untuk merealisasikan impian anak perempuan mereka.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep37
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep26
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Yuk Bisa Yuk Nikah Bestie
programme.desc: Aida ke Jakarta untuk menunaikan wasiat ayahnya iaitu mengahwini anak kawan ayahnya. Ternyata Ben adalah orang yang arwah ayahnya ingin dia kahwini.

programme.title: BUSER Investigasi Ep2
programme.desc: BUSER atau BUru SERgap Investigasi adalah program berita mengenai jenayah yang telah berlaku di Indonesia.

programme.title: Jatuh Bangun Perjuangan Anak Supir Yang Sukses Menjadi Polwan
programme.desc: Cita-cita Aisyah ingin menjadi polis wanita, tetapi kewangan keluarganya hanya sederhana. Namun begitu, ibu bapa Aisyah bertekad untuk merealisasikan impian anak perempuan mereka.

programme.title: Pandemi Menyadarkan Suamiku Siapa Istri Yang Tulus
programme.desc: Kemunculan virus corona meresahkan ramai orang. Pasangan suami isteri, Diana dan Fedy yang berkurung selama 3 bulan membuatkan Diana curiga terhadap suaminya.

programme.title: Gulali Manis Bebas Toxic
programme.desc: Satria sangat marah apabila anak saudaranya diberikan gula-gula oleh Bella, si penjual gula-gula. Tapi kenapa Satria meminta Bella menjaga anak saudaranya? Adakah sebenarnya Satria benci atau hanya ingin mendekati Bella?

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep37

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep387
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep388
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep27
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep38
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Bintang Pantura 6 Ep37
programme.desc: Bintang Pantura 6 kini kembali! Juragan Soimah ditemani oleh Nunung (Pembantu Juragan) dan Inul Daratista (Rakan Perniagaan Juragan) akan mencari 40 peserta untuk bertanding di pentas impian. Bersama mentor: Nassar, Via Vallen, Dewi Perssik, Jenita Janet, Happy Asmara dan para Konco Pantura.

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep39
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: Miss Kuli Dan Boss Sejoli
programme.desc: Gita, seorang wanita yang kuat dan tegap, bekerja sebagai buruh binaan. Dia sentiasa diusik oleh orang di kampungnya, walaupun dia cuba menjadi feminin. Gita jatuh cinta dengan Farel yang sedang berpacaran dengan Nora ketika itu. Pada suatu hari, Farel mendapat tahu Nora sedang menjalin hubungan sulit dengan pembantunya, Juna. Ketika itulah Farel mula menaruh perasaan pada Gita.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep39
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Konser Raya 27th Indosiar Luar Biasa Ep2
programme.desc: Malam terakhir sambutan tahun ke-27 Indosiar penuh dengan warna berkilauan, percikan bintang, dan persembahan yang luar biasa. Tonton konsert hebat yang penuh dengan kejutan!

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep39
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: An unstoppable string of mishaps awaits when greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: The Age Of Blood
programme.desc: The once best swordsman in Joseon, Kim Ho, was demoted as a prison guard after a lost battle and fought with a rebel force that snuck into the jail to save their captured leader.

programme.title: A Barefoot Dream
programme.desc: A former soccer player from South Korea, who failed to manage his business, travels to the small country of East Timor to coach a youth soccer team.

programme.title: Man Of Will
programme.desc: In 1980s, a young scholar transforms into an independence fighter after being wrongly jailed.

programme.title: South Bound
programme.desc: Choi Hae-gap has a family who will stand by his decisions given any scenario. As a team, they fight the government's plans to build a resort on the island of their ancestors.

programme.title: Athena: Goddess Of War
programme.desc: Set in the same murky world as IRIS, a new group of agents must face off against terrorists and untangle a dangerous conspiracy threatening national security.

programme.title: She'S On Duty
programme.desc: In order to catch a gangster, a cop goes undercover as a high school girl to get close to the gangster's daughter.

programme.title: The Battleship Island
programme.desc: During the colonial rule of Japan, around 400 Koreans are conscripted into slave labor on Hashima Island. As the island’s dark secrets are revealed, the Korean labourers plot to escape.

programme.title: Miracle: Letters To The President
programme.desc: A math prodigy who dreams of building a small railway station in his village works hard to win the presidential math competition and present his petition to the President in person.

programme.title: Vanishing Time: A Boy Who Returned
programme.desc: A 13-year-old boy goes missing after venturing into a cave in a forest with his friends and later mysteriously reappears a few days later as man in his 30s.

programme.title: Luck-Key
programme.desc: A case of stolen identity leads to hilarious events when a struggling actor and a hit man for hire swaps lives.

programme.title: My Little Bride
programme.desc: A high school girl was forced to marry a college student by her grandfather. The effort to keep the marriage secret was soon challenged as her husband will be teaching in her school as an intern…

programme.title: An Old Lady
programme.desc: A 69-year-old woman was raped by a 29-year-old male nurse. Taking the courage to report to the police, people questioned the credibility of her claim. Could she protects her dignity?

programme.title: Love Guide For Dumpees
programme.desc: Two recently dumped singles spend a wild drunken night together to get over their exes, then agree to meet nine more times before promising never to see other again.

programme.title: 71: Into The Fire
programme.desc: 71 student-soldiers fight an impossible war against the elite 766 Commando Brigade and turn the tide of the Korean War.

programme.title: Baseball Girl
programme.desc: A young girl is graduating from high school and determined to become the first female player to join a professional baseball in Korea.

programme.title: Love+Sling
programme.desc: Despite having zero interest in the sport, Sung-woong trains to become a top wrestler with his dad's enthusiastic support. When the girl he likes falls for his dad, they begin wrestling for love.

programme.title: Anarchist From Colony
programme.desc: The true story a Korean patriot Park Yeol, who formed the anarchist organization "Black Wave" during the Japanese colonial period and attempted the assassination of the Japanese Crown Prince Hirohito.

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: An unusual family is born as two ruthless loan sharks take in a little girl as collateral for unpaid debts.

programme.title: Man Of Will
programme.desc: In 1980s, a young scholar transforms into an independence fighter after being wrongly jailed.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: An unstoppable string of mishaps awaits when greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: Miss Granny
programme.desc: Complications and hilarity ensues when a 70-year-old woman living unhappily with her son's family is magically restored to her beauty of 50 years earlier.

programme.title: Heung-Boo: The Revolutionist
programme.desc: Set in the Joseon dynasty, a satirical street play becomes popular among the people. Heung-boo, its author, gains fame and is sought by conflicting powers who want to use him for their own agendas.

programme.title: Toxic
programme.desc: Based on a true story, <Toxic> depicts the truth behind millions of mysterious death happened only in Spring.

programme.title: Vanishing Time: A Boy Who Returned
programme.desc: A 13-year-old boy goes missing after venturing into a cave in a forest with his friends and later mysteriously reappears a few days later as man in his 30s.

programme.title: Kingmaker
programme.desc: A politician met a talented campaign strategist who helped him in becoming the strongest presidential election candidate. Yet conflicts deepen as the he disagrees with the latter on his ideologies.

programme.title: A Man Who Was Superman
programme.desc: Soo-jung met a man who claimed himself as a "superman" and loves to give a helping hand to people in need. She then realizes the story behind his seemingly weird behavior...

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: The Age Of Blood
programme.desc: The once best swordsman in Joseon, Kim Ho, was demoted as a prison guard after a lost battle and fought with a rebel force that snuck into the jail to save their captured leader.

programme.title: Golden Slumber
programme.desc: A delivery man finds himself entwined in a dangerous conspiracy when he is accused of assassinating a presidential candidate. To stay alive, he must uncover the truth and clear his name.

programme.title: Mental Coach Jegal Ep10
programme.desc: Jegal Gil, a Taekwondo athlete who is permanently expelled from the national team due to an accident, returns to the athlete’s village and becomes a mental coach to help players in slump.

programme.title: EXchange 2 Ep17
programme.desc: Dating reality show <EXchange> is back with season 2! When the ex-couples reunite and start building relationships with each other, will they get back with their ex or date someone new?

programme.title: One Night Food Trip- International Edition Ep6
programme.desc: Stay tuned to this spin-off of “One Night Food Trip” toured by Korean and local celebrities and find out the delicacies you can't miss in different Asian countries!

programme.title: Tale of the Nine Tailed Ep5
programme.desc: A romance fantasy drama that tells the story of a fearless producer determined to hunt down a nine-tailed fox who goes after evils that disrupt the order of the human world.

programme.title: Tale of the Nine Tailed Ep6
programme.desc: A romance fantasy drama that tells the story of a fearless producer determined to hunt down a nine-tailed fox who goes after evils that disrupt the order of the human world.

programme.title: Young Actors' Retreat Ep6
programme.desc: Meet the 15 actors from “Love in the Moonlight”, “Itaewon Class” and “The Sound of Magic” on one screen! Members of each drama team are going to reunite, mix together and go on a refreshing retreat.

programme.title: Young Actors' Retreat Ep7
programme.desc: Meet the 15 actors from “Love in the Moonlight”, “Itaewon Class” and “The Sound of Magic” on one screen! Members of each drama team are going to reunite, mix together and go on a refreshing retreat.

programme.title: Missing: The Other Side Ep8
programme.desc: Kim Wook, an ex-swindler, accidentally arrives at a village where the missing dead live. While helping the villagers solve the mystery of deaths, he finds out why he’s the only one able to see them…

programme.title: Street Man Fighter Ep6

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep771772
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44774478
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1944
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3485
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Radio Broadcasting Golden Bell Awards 2022 (M)
programme.desc: Radio Broadcasting Golden Bell Awards is one of the annual events of the Taiwan media industry in 2022 to reward the outstanding Taiwanese radio practitioners in 2022. Total of 885 submissions and 126 nominations for 26 awards, who is going to be the winner of the night?

programme.title: Back To Home (M) Ep56
programme.desc: When the news reached her that the old village leader had passed away, Xiao Li, who was a personal shopper, stuffed a few things into her Hermes bag and, clutching the lucky salt he had once given her, set out for her home town wearing her Prada high-heeled shoes. That night A-Jian, who was helping out in a Japanese restaurant, also jumped on the bus and headed home as soon as he received the news. In his will, the old man divided up his salt fields among the villagers, but on the condition that A-Jian and Xiao Li get married. When they heard this, A-Jian and Xiao Li found themselves immediately surrounded…

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep828
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep748749
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep640
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep418
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Piggy's Counter-Attack (M) Ep4243
programme.desc: A rich father, who built his fortune from nothing, goes bankrupt overnight when his investments fail. His children are knocked out of heaven and have to launch a counterattack.

programme.title: Peace Breaker
programme.desc: Police officer Gao accidentally kills a pedestrian on the way to his mother's funeral. He tries to dispose the body by hiding it in his mother's coffin. As the pedestrian turns out to be a wanted person and a police officer witnessed the accident, Gao is forced to bring his body back to the police station. Can the case be settled so easily?

programme.title: Cross
programme.desc: Lee believes people who commit suicide will go to hell. After his wife killed herself because of cancer, Lee feels the pain of people with suicidal thoughts and thinks of killing them to bring them to heaven. He then kills the four people from a suicidal website. Despite Lee seeing himself acting upon God’s will, his belief is being challenged.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend’s wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge – will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: 77 Heartbreaks
programme.desc: Adam is upset after breaking up with Eva and has a drunken tryst with Mandy. He discovers Eva’s diary which recorded her 77 heartbreaking experiences with him. Adam finally realizes Eva is his true love and they resolve to start anew. However, when Eva stumbles across evidence of his affair with Mandy, will she be able to pardon him a 78th time?

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Eva’s mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mother’s wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Eva’s heart?

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man’s matchless fighting skills are revered all over China. Set during the Sino-Japanese War, Ip Man is forced to leave his home and work to support his family. With only his martial arts skills, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Legend of the Naga Pearls
programme.desc: A thief and a constable team up to save humanity from creatures known as the Winged Tribe, who lost their power of flight centuries ago after their war against mankind. They are hell-bent on seeking revenge by obtaining a mystical artifact called the Naga Pearls.

programme.title: Love Off the Cuff
programme.desc: In this last film of “Love in a Puff” trilogy, Shawn Yue and Miriam Yeung reprise their roles as Jimmy and Cherie. After living together for five years, the couple doubt if they can live happily ever after…

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say “yes”?

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: A group of friends who are formerly close but now somewhat estranged, unite to help one of their own who is in trouble at work. In this hilarious comedy, the friends must find a replacement bottle of breast milk before the end of the day as chaos breaks out!

programme.title: Dealer Healer
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Dealer Healer follows the story of Chen Hua, a former underworld kingpin and drug dealer, who takes a new lease of life and help rehabilitate people from drug addiction.

programme.title: Keep Rolling
programme.desc: Directorial debut of Man Lim Chung, who spent 3 years filming this documentary about the life and filmmaking philosophy of Ann Hui, one of Hong Kong’s greatest filmmakers. It traces Hui’s life story and her 40-year career’s ups and downs using film footages, candid conversations with Hui, and interviews with her collaborators, family and friends.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: Office
programme.desc: Lee Seung is a hopeful and idealistic new hire at a billion-dollar company. However, he soon finds that this new world is more complicated than he thought, with a myriad of illicit relationships, including one between the company chairman and the CEO, and the cutthroat world of finance laid bare before his eyes as the company prepares to go public.

programme.title: That Demon Within
programme.desc: A dutiful police Dave, saves the life of a gang leader, Lin. When Lin commits another crime, Dave regrets his action and suffers from a severe mental disorder at the same time. He becomes a fugitive wanted for murder and tries to destroy Lin and his gang so as to restore his reputation as a good police officer.

programme.title: Justice, My Foot!
programme.desc: Chow stars as Sung, a lawyer who uses any means necessary to help his wealthy clients escape the law. Sung retires to the countryside when urged by his wife, but when Mrs Sung encounters a woman whose husband's death has been covered up by corrupted officials, Sung returns to the court for justice to be served.

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: Members of an internet suicide room called Life Club decide to end their lives using explosives. But every time the fireworks explode, they find themselves back-in-time before they carried out their plan. They suspect the cause of this mystery to be the young age of one of the members and tries to convince the high school girl to quit…

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Police’s Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Mobsters Wah and Fly are buddies. Wah loves his cousin, but cannot make their relationship work as he is a mobster. Fly infuriates a mob boss one day and got beaten up badly, implicating Wah too. He then takes up a fatal task to make amends…

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: A bachelorette weekend spins hilariously out of control when three friends wake up naked on a beach and find themselves handcuffed to a mysterious briefcase, with local gangsters in pursuit. They must regain memories of what happened that weekend if they hope to go back home safely!

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk
programme.desc: Daoji, a mystic monk during the Southern Song dynasty, has been tasked to protect the people from monsters. However, when the Emperor dies under suspicious circumstances, Daoji uncovers an evil conspiracy and must seek help from the Emperor of the Gods and five of the strongest demigods to combat the dark forces threatening the world!

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chef’s delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack…

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his father’s death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the “Toad Stance” and accidentally unveils his true identity…

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friend’s grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fête. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant’s confusion, threatening the couple’s union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Kid From Kwangtung
programme.desc: After many years as a respected actor (The Chinese Boxer) and action choreographer (Jackie Chan's Drunken Master), the Shaw Studio finally gave the dependable and commendable Hsu Hsia a chance to direct his own movies. He didn't waste the opportunity, inviting three other kung-fu designers to help on this fight-filled thriller. Wang Yu, co-star of such classics as Dirty Ho and The Kid With A Tattoo, here takes center stage as a young rascal caught between an anti-Ching Confederation and violent, vengeful Ching troops. But when he discovers that the good guys are led by master martial arts actor Jen Shih-kuan (Once Upon A Time In China) and the bad guys are led by the incredible Huang Cheng-li (Snake In The Eagle's Shadow) everyone knows that loads of great kung-fu is in store.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband’s playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Heaven Sword And Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from “Nine Yang Scriptures” by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: The Lady Hermit is hiding for years, plotting revenge after she has been defeated by the sinister Black Knight. Shaolin Handlock is a lethal go-getter who begs Lady Hermit to teach her, hoping to slay the demon herself. The Black Knight's days are numbered as the Lady Hermit and her protege perfect the technique to take him down.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiancée Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent’s consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her…

programme.title: When The Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: Masked Avengers
programme.desc: The "godfather of the kung-fu film," Chang Cheh, started a winning streak by making the internationally renowned THE FIVE VENOMS. He followed that hit with many more high-flying "bloody good" entertainments featuring the same cast in new roles. But of all the "Venom" movies, this one stands out as perhaps the most chilling. Masked killers are wreaking havoc and instilling terror with their vicious weapons of choice: razor-sharp, gut-shattering tridents. Only three fearless fighters dare investigate, leading to mass murder and magnificent martial arts. Chien Hsiao-hou, future co-star of Yuen Woo-ping's THE TAI-CHI MASTER joins the trio to get tri-pierced. The core "Venoms" themselves handle the intricate, always impressive, sometimes awe-inspiring, choreography in this unforgettable exercise in "grand guignol kung-fu."

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: Clan Of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: The Blue And The Black
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai struggles with The Blue forces of freedom, love, the sea and the sky, and The Black, the bottomless pit of evil. Lin’s poignant performance is memorable, however, it is that of newcomer Angela Yu Chien, who was named Best Supporting Actress. Part I ends with a literal cliffhanger, setting the stage for the equally memorable Part II.

programme.title: The Boxer From The Temple
programme.desc: A young monk, The Kid, was expelled from the temple due to his crazy ways. After leaving the temple, he fights a cruel bandit's son and befriends a prostitute. As he fights for justice, his “Crazy Lo Han Fist” improves with every fight.

programme.title: Asia-Pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: Lover'S Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man’s role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc:
Wang Hsiao Feng plays a girl from a rich family who marries a sympathetic, equally heartbroken passer-by on impulse. One thing after another occurs until the couple achieves an unexpected, yet completely satisfying and happy ending.
The 5th Hong Kong Film Awards: Best Actress (Wang Hsiao Feng) / Best Screenplay (Jamie Luk & Charles Tang)

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: The Kid With The Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: The bandits of Hulu Valley slay the chief of the Mei Clan while searching for a treasure map. In retaliation, Chun from the Mei Clan infiltrates the bandit's fortress to map a way in for the authorities, but ends up falling in love with the bandit leader's daughter, Pearl. While Chun’s plot is uncovered, he receives unexpected help from Pearl.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xu’s until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A noble martial arts student, whose master and peers are murdered by a bloodthirsty karate expert, embarks on a tough training regime so as to avenge them.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his family’s declining status. Lin visits his fiancée before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lin’s bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, seek to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.title: The Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister’s wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to trap Wong’s disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong thus to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor’s sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called “The Venoms”, and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: Ahcamindri
programme.desc: Sakthi, a pickpocket, and Sathya, a police officer, must work together to find out who is responsible for a series of deaths and bring them to justice.

programme.title: Bhaskar Oru Rascal
programme.desc: Bhaskar, a single parent, is labelled rascal because of his impolite behaviour. His son, Akash, decides to set him up with Anu, whose daughter is Akash's classmate.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Ignoring her misgivings, a young woman purchases a vintage car, which seems to have a mind of its own. Further investigation reveals that it is possessed by a vengeful spirit with ties to her past.

programme.title: Kennedy Club
programme.desc: Savarimuthu, an ex-soldier, falls sick while training the women's kabaddi team of his village. Soon, a former student named Muruganandham is chosen to take his place.

programme.title: Sethupathy
programme.desc: Sethupathi, a tough police officer, investigates the murder of an inspector. His findings lead to the arrest of Vathiyar, an influential man in Madurai, but put his life, career and family at risk.

programme.title: The Priest
programme.desc: Father Carmen, a priest, joins hands with the police to investigate a series of mysterious suicides. However, he soon stumbles upon a disturbing fact that has serious consequences.

programme.title: Vanamagan
programme.desc: Kavya, a rich girl, goes to a restricted area in Andaman to celebrate the New Year with her friends. While evading the forest officers in the jungle, she knocks Jara, a tribal man, with her car.

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: An unemployed Rajini Murugan falls in love with Karthika, but her father opposes their union due to an old misunderstanding. Things get better after Rajini inherits his grandfather's property.

programme.title: Vantha Rajavathan Varuven
programme.desc: The young heir of a rich family sets out to effect a reconciliation between estranged family members.

programme.title: Kuttram 23
programme.desc: ACP Vetrimaaran unravels a crime racket involving medical professionals. However, his task becomes harder every day as the case becomes murkier and complex.

programme.title: Operation Java
programme.desc: A team of police officers from the Kochi cyber cell embarks on a mission to investigate a series of mysterious crimes and unlawful activities.

programme.title: Pattathu Yaanai
programme.desc: Saravanan and his friends, with their new boss Gouravam, come to Trichy to set up a new restaurant. Their plans get messed up when Saravanan falls for Aishwarya, who is also pursued by a gangster.

programme.title: Chithrai Sevvanam
programme.desc: When a man's daughter goes missing after a private video of her is leaked, he teams up with an upright cop to find her and bring the perpetrators to justice.

programme.title: Oru Pakka Kathai
programme.desc: The marriage of Meera, a college student, and her boyfriend Saravanan has been approved by the family. But the condition is as after a job after graduation. But when Meera becomes pregnant, the whole story gets upside down

programme.title: Ko 2
programme.desc: Ko 2 revolves around a man who kidnaps the chief minister of the state and the mystery over why he does so.

programme.title: Sridevi Soda Center
programme.desc: A lightman falls in love with Sridevi, a girl who runs a soda centre. Although love blossoms between the two, the prevailing caste prejudice in their small town does not approve of their togetherness.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: The home minister requests Ravi to impersonate the deceased ACP Baldev, his lookalike, to catch Ganguly, a dreaded gangster. After taking over his new role, Ravi finds many startling revelations.

programme.title: Kavan
programme.desc: A TV journalist goes against the orders of his corrupt and dishonest boss and helps a group of youngsters in their fight against a pesticide factory.

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: Following an accident, a young man gets a major surgery performed on his face. However, when he realises that a lot of people are after his life, he decides to find out why.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.title: Manjapai
programme.desc: An aged villager comes to the city and sets people right.

programme.title: Thiraiflix
programme.desc: An entertainment-based programme.

programme.title: Nadigayar Thilagam
programme.desc: Savitri, the most admired actress from South Indian cinema, goes through various tragic incidents in her personal life. Unable to cope with depression, she eventually becomes an alcoholic.

programme.title: Miruga
programme.desc: Forest officials in Kotagiri hunt a man-eating tiger that is attacking innocent people. At the same time, a serial killer is on the prowl for wealthy single women.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep18
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Hagola Ep04
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep05
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole - Season 2 Ep15
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole - Season 2 Ep16
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru- Season 2 Ep36
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru- Season 2 Ep37
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo - Season 2 Ep38
programme.desc: Kicko and Super Speedo are out on a mission to be the saviour of Sun City, fighting an array of villains and their set of super cars.

programme.title: Honey Bunny The Millionaires Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai- Season 14 Ep04
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai- Season 14 Ep05
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Paap O Meter: Season 4 Ep12
programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior

programme.title: Paap O Meter: Season 4 Ep13

programme.desc: Sandro, a middle-aged bachelor, seems to find little success with online dating. Everything changes when he meets and falls in love with Manana. However, it turns out she is married and her husband is just about to be released from jail…

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: Nicoline is the psychologist in charge of rehabilitating Idris, a serial sex offender. He tries hard to convince her of his renewed goodness, only to be constantly rejected by her. A disturbing but sickeningly alluring power play develops between them.

programme.title: Greta's Wedding
programme.desc: Greta is set to marry in a week. Shortly before the big day, she discovers that her divorce papers with her ex-husband have a legal mistake. She goes to great lengths to rectify it – but little does she know that her life will be derailed in ways unimagined.

programme.title: Romancing The Jungle
programme.desc: Eva is a rookie journalist keen on investigating sea piracy. When she is really kidnapped by pirates in Thailand, she is forced to fight for her life. With her is a hunky smuggler called Nik, and together, the comedic duo band together to survive.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Mermaid
programme.desc: Two detectives investigate the death of a mermaid, Sybille Baumgartner, who was found beaten to death on the shore of Lake Constance. They suspect the killer was Matteo, a kite-surfer who left the crime scene with a knife in his abdomen.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Hostage in Manila
programme.desc: When two German tourists are kidnapped in the Philippines, the State Department has no choice but to send firebrand Karla Lorenz, who tends to go it alone - but at least she gets the job done, even if it means risking her own life.

programme.title: Writings On The Wall
programme.desc: While digesting the abrupt death of his son, Ah Song seizes Arul, a 15-year-old vandal, at his doorstep, and drags the boy along on a journey to unravel the cause of his harassments.

programme.title: A Summer In Brittany
programme.desc: Brimming with anticipation, recently separated veterinarian Britta embarks on a long-awaited vacation in the French province of Brittany and accidentally runs over fisherman Yves.

programme.title: Mom Or Dad?
programme.desc: After years of marriage, Valeria and Nicola decide to amicably divorce. However, when both receive lucrative job offers abroad, each tries to avoid having custody of the kids by fashioning themselves as a bad parent. A hilarious war of tricks ensues.

programme.title: The Coroner: Exquisite Corpse
programme.desc: Alexandra, a forensic pathologist, is determined to piece together her latest assignment; only the foot and leg of a murder victim has been found. With caution thrown to the wind, she faces the killer head-on in order to recover the rest of the body parts.

programme.title: The Sound Of Trees
programme.desc: 17-year-old Jérémie dreams of a life away from his family’s sawmill and forestry work. He much prefers pimping his car, hip hop and slacking off with friends - much to his father’s despair. When his brother leaves town, their lives change drastically.

programme.title: Karnaval
programme.desc: Alis, a 36-year-old, who lives in his car after being kicked out from his parent’s house, finds himself selling carpet cleaners. Through the “Karnaval” brand of carpet cleaners, he meets Demet, an ambitious wedding cake maker.

programme.title: Blind Dates
programme.desc: Sandro, a middle-aged bachelor, seems to find little success with online dating. Everything changes when he meets and falls in love with Manana. However, it turns out she is married and her husband is just about to be released from jail…

programme.title: Greta's Wedding
programme.desc: Greta is set to marry in a week. Shortly before the big day, she discovers that her divorce papers with her ex-husband have a legal mistake. She goes to great lengths to rectify it – but little does she know that her life will be derailed in ways unimagined.

programme.title: Writings On The Wall

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Mermaid
programme.desc: Two detectives investigate the death of a mermaid, Sybille Baumgartner, who was found beaten to death on the shore of Lake Constance. They suspect the killer was Matteo, a kite-surfer who left the crime scene with a knife in his abdomen.

programme.title: I'm Losing It
programme.desc: When her fitness-obsessed boyfriend dumps her for a skinny girl, shy and chubby Anna resolves to slim down and win him back. But, with help from her plump health-nut buddy Nick, Anna discovers that true happiness is more than six-pack abs.

programme.title: A Summer In Brittany
programme.desc: Brimming with anticipation, recently separated veterinarian Britta embarks on a long-awaited vacation in the French province of Brittany and accidentally runs over fisherman Yves.

programme.title: Right On Target, Baby
programme.desc: Orazio and Anna are a couple in their forties who struggle to start a family at an age when conceiving a child is notably difficult. Along their journey to parenthood, they have to contend with mishaps, popular beliefs and superstitions.

programme.title: The Coroner: Exquisite Corpse
programme.desc: Alexandra, a forensic pathologist, is determined to piece together her latest assignment; only the foot and leg of a murder victim has been found. With caution thrown to the wind, she faces the killer head-on in order to recover the rest of the body parts.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Curse From The Deep
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Florian Friedrich recovers a hoard of old coins from the bottom of Lake Constance, but is later found dead with his mouth sewn up with a gold coin inside. Two detectives are called to investigate the mysterious death.

programme.title: The Sound Of Trees
programme.desc: 17-year-old Jérémie dreams of a life away from his family’s sawmill and forestry work. He much prefers pimping his car, hip hop and slacking off with friends - much to his father’s despair. When his brother leaves town, their lives change drastically.

programme.title: Rust

programme.title: Karnaval

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep172

No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.desc: Dangerously Fast - A military veteran, a college soccer player, and a dancer are just 3 of the competitors in the Tag Arena. Bodies are pushed to their limits as they battle the pro-Taggers. And there’s just one rule: Don’t.Get.Caught!

programme.title: Born To Be Wild Ep1
programme.desc: South America - Born To Be Wild

programme.title: Born To Be Wild Ep2
programme.desc: Africa - Born To Be Wild

programme.title: Born To Be Wild Ep3
programme.desc: Australia - Born To Be Wild

programme.title: From Russia To Iran: Crossing The Wild Frontier Ep3
programme.desc: Episode 3 sees the explorer and his guide journey by any means available deeper into the badlands of Dagestan, a region of Russia that the British Foreign Office warns against visiting under any circumstances.

programme.title: Halo Ep1
programme.desc: Contact - In the year 2552, humans on the planet Madrigal have been fighting for independence from Earth, but a fatal encounter with the Alien Covenant changes everything.

programme.title: Halo Ep2
programme.desc: Unbound - John takes Kwan to an old friend and learns more about the mystery object. Dr. Halsey has a plan.

programme.title: Halo Ep3
programme.desc: Emergence - John meets his new partner, and he discovers secrets inside his own memory. Kwan wants to return to Madrigal to continue her people’s fight for independence, but Soren has other plans for her.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep3
programme.desc: The Grasslands - SerpentZA & Laowhy86 stop off in the capital of Heilongjiang province, Harbin. From there, they venture into the vast grasslands of Inner Mongolia, herding camels and building their very own Mongolian yurt.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep4
programme.desc: China’s Northernmost Point - SerpentZA & Laowhy86 learn how Mongolians cook goats in their own skins, get serenaded by locals on the China/Russian border, and finally complete their journey at China’s northernmost point.

programme.title: From Russia To Iran: Crossing The Wild Frontier Ep1
programme.desc: Levison arrives in Sochi on the edge of the Black Sea before flying into the Caucasus region by military helicopter. After being dropped off on a remote track, he searches for someone to take him to the nearest town.

programme.title: From Russia To Iran: Crossing The Wild Frontier Ep2
programme.desc: Levison and Rasheed join a wedding celebration and a bizarre mock bride kidnapping during a motorcade involving what appears to be a real policeman and live ammunition.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Uninvited House Guest / Perimeter Breach / Asylum Attack - Police Officer Jennifer gets a 911 call for a violent home invasion. Military security officer Dan met a woman in distress while at work. Paramedic Ryleigh was called to transport a patient from a boys' psychiatric home.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Backyard Hanging / Dr. Dead / The Mist - A man calls 911 because he thinks he see someone hanging from a tree. Officer joe answers a 911 call of an intruder call at a convalescent home. Officer Jim is dispatched when a call comes in for an abandoned vehicle.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Campus Cult / Eye Contact - Police Officer Brittany and partner are called to an emergency at a remote part of the university – a parking lot beside a long-condemned building. Firefighter Hector is driving home with his wife when he gets a call.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Basement Dweller / Do Not Resuscitate / Children Of Barn - Security guard Eric answers a motion alarm in the basement of the nursing home. EMT Commander Ceredwyn answers a call for a patient in distress. An elderly woman has had a medical attack, collapsing on her 911-call pad.

programme.title: From Russia To Iran: Crossing The Wild Frontier Ep3
programme.desc: Episode 3 sees the explorer and his guide journey by any means available deeper into the badlands of Dagestan, a region of Russia that the British Foreign Office warns against visiting under any circumstances.

programme.desc: This episode looks at how Skippy peanut butter, courgette Parmesan, pistachios, and chocolate bars are made.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep22
programme.desc: This episode looks at how candy coloured almonds, 'bagelwich', `s'mores' and miso soup are made on a large scale.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Dutch engineers built a giant arch full of apartments on top of a swamp, while in China, a rock shaped opera house that pushes engineering and design using the most modern and ancient of techniques.

programme.desc: Oceans - There are not five separate oceans, but one. Its waters linked by powerful forces that keep them on the move. This constant mixing is vital for the health of oceans and marine life.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Australia - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores the continent of Australia - a unique land, cast adrift at the time of the dinosaurs.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Defenders of the Reef Ep4
programme.desc: It’s summer in the Gulf of Oman. The scorching Arabian sun heats the shallow waters to 86 degrees boosting the growth of algae across a vast coral reef. This attracts thousands of hungry herbivores creating a fish versus fish turf war.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - A Turtle's Legacy Ep5
programme.desc: The sea turtle is one of the oldest animals on earth. These ancient mariners even pre-date the dinosaurs. They have existed, relatively unchanged, for over 100 million years. But now, all seven of the surviving species are endangered.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Island of the White Shark Ep1
programme.desc: Off Guadalupe Island, Mexico, top shark ecologist Mauricio Hoyos attempts a television first. Get a unique view as he attaches a camera to the dorsal fin of a great white, revealing how it swims, hunts, and ultimately strikes its prey.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Bimini Sharklab Ep2
programme.desc: Travel to a remote part of the Bahamas to unlock shark secrets. Do they make friends? Where do they give birth? Are some bolder than others? The answers may help protect these supreme predators for generations to come.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to the planet’s biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africa’s east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Creatures of the Night Ep7
programme.desc: Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight - especially for researchers who know they’re not supposed to be here. The Southern flying squirrel, typically found along the shores of Lake Erie, is now moving its territory up towards Lake Ontario and beyond thanks to warmer winters.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Cozumel Ep5
programme.desc: Clear waters, deep reefs, dangerous caves, and tunnels draw divers to the island of Cozumel on Mexico’s east coast. The Caribbean Sea port is home to multicoloured schools of fish, bull sharks, and gigantic sea turtles.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Island Feast Ep3
programme.desc: Off the coast of Oman, summer weather drives nutrients in from the ocean depths where they meet the Arabian sun, causing an explosion of life. Smaller fish spawn, filling the waters with eggs. This creates a buffet predators just can’t resist.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Defenders of the Reef Ep4
programme.desc: It’s summer in the Gulf of Oman. The scorching Arabian sun heats the shallow waters to 86 degrees boosting the growth of algae across a vast coral reef. This attracts thousands of hungry herbivores creating a fish versus fish turf war.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - A Turtle's Legacy Ep5
programme.desc: The sea turtle is one of the oldest animals on earth. These ancient mariners even pre-date the dinosaurs. They have existed, relatively unchanged, for over 100 million years. But now, all seven of the surviving species are endangered.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Island of the White Shark Ep1
programme.desc: Off Guadalupe Island, Mexico, top shark ecologist Mauricio Hoyos attempts a television first. Get a unique view as he attaches a camera to the dorsal fin of a great white, revealing how it swims, hunts, and ultimately strikes its prey.
